We understand that this investment could be substantial, but we are confident that the benefits will far outweigh the cost. Should you have any questions or require further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,250,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,250,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,500,000
